entity.name: Sarah Huckabee Sanders
entity.description: White House Press Secretary Sarah Huckabee Sanders

text: @PressSec @realDonaldTrump What does she not understand? 33% of the world Coronavirus cases are in our country and we have only tested 6% more than South Korea? What is our GDP compared to SKorea? Over 58,000 Americans have died and you revel in our testing numbers? Stupid!
